duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate company commercial vehicles and deliver/pick up building materials to construction sites
Assist with debris removal from Jobsite to truck
Ensure safe operation of company equipment at all times
Lift and carry up to 50lbs unassisted
Be flexible with a changing daily schedule and on-call response
Transport equipment and materials, including disposal

education_certification.credential: Commercial Class C Driver's license or greater and clean driving record
40 Hour HAZWOPER training preferred, but not required
